participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Cautious yet hopeful, she often worries about her future but tries to stay positive.
participant_1.background: i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Resilient and pragmatic, he faces challenges head-on and believes in moving forward despite setbacks.
participant_2.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.
